creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
2 poems(kyo_ka)

right:Your wandering heart 
Is like the restless
Village sparrowl;
Before long, Rumors being to fly
(Sadamenaki 
Kimi no kokoro no
Murasuzume
Tsui ni ukina no
Hatto tatsuran)
by Aya Orinushi

left:Colors of the dove
Do not fade with age;
We too will not change
No matter the number
Of New Year's bean we eat
(Hato no tsume
Tsukumade iro wa 
Kawaraji na
Tagai no toshi no
Mame wa ku_ tomo)
by Sono Kocho_
medium: From a woodblock printed book, ink and color on paper
portfolio: Myriad Birds: Kyōka Comparisons (Momo chidori kyōka awase 百千鳥狂歌合)
title: Tree Sparrow and Rock Dove
